
Changelog
=========

0.5.0 (2025-09-24)
------------------
* Returns fig and ax objects in the static_view plots.

* Raise an error when there is no Monitor for the results.monitor

------------------
* Added Voltage LL Nodes results. Code provided by Wes

0.0.0 (2021-05-18)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
